name: 5th International Conference on Natural Language Processing, Information Retrieval and AI
content: 5th International Conference on Natural Language Processing, Information Retrieval and AI (NIAI 2024) January 20 \~ 21, 2024, Zurich, Switzerland https://ccseit2024.org/niai/index Scope 5th International Conference on Natural Language Processing, Information Retrieval and AI (NIAI 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Natural Language Computing, Information Retrieval and AI. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following: • Artificial Intelligence • Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning, Machine Learning for NLP • Big Data and Data Mining • Information Retrieval • Machine Translation, Crosslingual and Multilingual applications • Natural Language Processing • Social Media and Social Network Analysis • Spoken Language Processing Speech Generation and Recognition Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by January 06, 2024\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). • Machine Learning and Applications: An International Journal (MLAIJ) • International Journal of Web & Semantic Technology (IJWesT) - IS Indexed • International Journal on Natural Language Computing (IJNLC) • International Journal of Artificial Intelligence & Applications (IJAIA) • Important Dates • Submission Deadline : January 06, 2024 • Authors Notification : January 13, 2024 • Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : January 16, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : niai@ccseit2024.org or niaiconf@yahoo.com Paper Submission Link https://ccseit2024.org/submission/index.php
